actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that payments made to a hospitalized incompetent veteran will not be terminated unless his estate exceeds $2,000.

summary.text: Provides that payments made to a hospitalized incompetent veteran will not be terminated unless his estate exceeds $2,000. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 3203).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that payments made to a hospitalized incompetent veteran will not be terminated unless his estate exceeds $2,000.
